svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 14 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 14, 2023" date: "2023-10-13"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .Â Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Devnet 9 testing continues, MEV-Boost testing started (need to test with blobs) Devnet
10 ideally launches next week, once KZG setup in CL specs/clients and devnet 9 testing complete EVM
Object Format (EOF) status update Discussions on priorities/timeline for EOF & Verkle, whether to ever
include EOF and L1/L2 EVM divergence
â€¢ Devnet 9 testing continues, MEV-Boost testing started (need to test with blobs)
Devnet 9 testing continues, MEV-Boost testing started (need to test with blobs)
â€¢ Devnet 10 ideally launches next week, once KZG setup in CL specs/clients and devnet 9 testing
complete
Devnet 10 ideally launches next week, once KZG setup in CL specs/clients and devnet 9 testing complete
â€¢ EVM Object Format (EOF) status update
EVM Object Format (EOF) status update
â€¢ Discussions on priorities/timeline for EOF & Verkle, whether to ever include EOF and L1/L2 EVM
divergence
Discussions on priorities/timeline for EOF & Verkle, whether to ever include EOF and L1/L2 EVM
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.89% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold Arbitrum delegates
voted against incentives for Lido
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.89% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Arbitrum delegates
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality Blockprint (CL client diversity analysis) updated to include accuracy data
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality Blockprint (CL
client diversity analysis) updated to include accuracy data
Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Blockprint (CL client diversity analysis) updated to include accuracy data
â€¢ Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Layer 1
â€¢ PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi (Geth): proposal for eth/69 to improve transaction propagation, no hard fork required
PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi (Geth): proposal for eth/69 to improve transaction propagation, no hard fork required
â€¢ Proposal for time restricted transaction execution , add a minStartTime field to transactions
Proposal for time restricted transaction execution , add a minStartTime field to transactions
â€¢ Verkle Tree cryptography implemented in Zig
Verkle Tree cryptography implemented in Zig
For Stakers
â€¢ Beacon chain churn limit increased to 13 per epoch (Dencun EIP7514 reduces to 8 for deposits)
Beacon chain churn limit increased to 13 per epoch (Dencun EIP7514 reduces to 8 for deposits)
â€¢ ~9k solo stakers : estimate based on deposit addresses interacting with smart contracts
~9k solo stakers : estimate based on deposit addresses interacting with smart contracts
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Teku v23.10.0 : attestation duty calculation performance improvements
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Teku v23.10.0 : attestation duty calculation performance improvements
â€¢ Execution layer: Besu v23.10.0 : Layered transaction pool now default Erigon v2.52.0 : fixes
Otterscan v2.1.0 alpha : adds indexer for withdrawals per address Geth v1.13.3 : updates Pebble to fix
occasional IO/CPU runaway
Execution layer:
â€¢ Besu v23.10.0 : Layered transaction pool now default
Besu v23.10.0 : Layered transaction pool now default
â€¢ Erigon v2.52.0 : fixes Otterscan v2.1.0 alpha : adds indexer for withdrawals per address
Erigon v2.52.0 : fixes
â€¢ Otterscan v2.1.0 alpha : adds indexer for withdrawals per address
â€¢ Geth v1.13.3 : updates Pebble to fix occasional IO/CPU runaway
Geth v1.13.3 : updates Pebble to fix occasional IO/CPU runaway
Research
â€¢ Vitalikâ€™s proposed staking design changes to give delegators power to choose nodes & participate in
consensus, improving decentralization & reducing consensus overhead
Vitalikâ€™s proposed staking design changes to give delegators power to choose nodes & participate in
â€¢ Minimum viable issuance (only issue ETH that is strictly needed for security): benefits & drawbacks
Minimum viable issuance (only issue ETH that is strictly needed for security): benefits & drawbacks
â€¢ PEPC-Boost : out of protocol relay design which auctions top-of-block & rest-of-block separately
PEPC-Boost : out of protocol relay design which auctions top-of-block & rest-of-block separately
â€¢ Commitment-Satisfaction Committees : leverage attesters to enforce commitments for PEPC
Commitment-Satisfaction Committees : leverage attesters to enforce commitments for PEPC
â€¢ Proposal for optional validator identification metadata
Proposal for optional validator identification metadata
Layer 2
â€¢ L2BEAT Build Your Own Rollup : simplified sovereign rollup for education purposes
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Informational) EIP7532 : Generation unit (64 epochs) EIP7534 : Theorem-carrying-transaction
EIPs
â€¢ (Informational) EIP7532 : Generation unit (64 epochs)
(Informational) EIP7532 : Generation unit (64 epochs)
â€¢ EIP7534 : Theorem-carrying-transaction
EIP7534 : Theorem-carrying-transaction
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7533 : Public cross port (connect EVM networks) ERC7535 : ETH (native
asset) tokenized vault (ERC4626)
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7533 : Public cross port (connect EVM networks)
ERC7533 : Public cross port (connect EVM networks)
â€¢ ERC7535 : ETH (native asset) tokenized vault (ERC4626)
ERC7535 : ETH (native asset) tokenized vault (ERC4626)
Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF Round 3 applications are open
Applications for Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF Round 3 are open!
In this round 30 million OP will be allocated to the builders, artists, creators, and educators who
have demonstrated their impact in building the Optimism Collective.
Apply now , applications close October 23
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Hardhat-viem (plugin): use Viem library in new & existing Hardhat projects
Hardhat-viem (plugin): use Viem library in new & existing Hardhat projects
â€¢ Foundry test summary : use summary flag for concise table of test results
Foundry test summary : use summary flag for concise table of test results
â€¢ P256Verifier : Solidity contract for P256 signature verification, deployed on mainnet
P256Verifier : Solidity contract for P256 signature verification, deployed on mainnet
â€¢ Vyper: titanoboa v0.1.8 (Vyper interpreter): adds Vyper v0.3.10 support, network mode to deploy
contracts, jupyter integration and coverage Snekmate v0.0.3 (Vyper contracts): updated to Vyper
v0.3.10, adds ERC2981 (NFT royalties)
Vyper:
â€¢ titanoboa v0.1.8 (Vyper interpreter): adds Vyper v0.3.10 support, network mode to deploy contracts,
jupyter integration and coverage
titanoboa v0.1.8 (Vyper interpreter): adds Vyper v0.3.10 support, network mode to deploy contracts,
â€¢ Snekmate v0.0.3 (Vyper contracts): updated to Vyper v0.3.10, adds ERC2981 (NFT royalties)
Snekmate v0.0.3 (Vyper contracts): updated to Vyper v0.3.10, adds ERC2981 (NFT royalties)
â€¢ Huff: Huff playground : Huff equivalent of evm.codes Tstore huff template : use tload & tstore
opcodes (in Dencun upgrade) via verbatim helper
Huff:
â€¢ Huff playground : Huff equivalent of evm.codes
Huff playground : Huff equivalent of evm.codes
â€¢ Tstore huff template : use tload & tstore opcodes (in Dencun upgrade) via verbatim helper
Tstore huff template : use tload & tstore opcodes (in Dencun upgrade) via verbatim helper
â€¢ Ethers.js v6.8.0 : updated to latest noble crypto libraries
Ethers.js v6.8.0 : updated to latest noble crypto libraries
â€¢ Alchemy account kit : toolkit for ERC4337 account abstraction
Alchemy account kit : toolkit for ERC4337 account abstraction
â€¢ Swiss Knife send tx : UI to deploy contract bytecode
Swiss Knife send tx : UI to deploy contract bytecode
â€¢ Call this : transaction builder UI with shareable link, uses WhatsABI
Call this : transaction builder UI with shareable link, uses WhatsABI
â€¢ ZK Hunt : RTS-like onchain PvP game built using MUD and circom
ZK Hunt : RTS-like onchain PvP game built using MUD and circom
Security
â€¢ Wise Lending exploit front run by MEV searcher c0ffeebabe
Wise Lending exploit front run by MEV searcher c0ffeebabe
â€¢ Threshold tBTC vulnerabilities disclosed , DoS vector and redemption mechanism design flaw
Threshold tBTC vulnerabilities disclosed , DoS vector and redemption mechanism design flaw
Ecosystem
â€¢ ETHRome hackathon winners
Enterprise
â€¢ BlackRock used tokenized money market fund as collateral in OTC derivatives trade on JPMorganâ€™s Onyx
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.3 to 47.7 gwei, with 7.4 gwei average Negative issuance
currently at 21.3 gwei 10.5k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.3 to 47.7 gwei, with 7.4 gwei average
â€¢ Negative issuance currently at 21.3 gwei
Negative issuance currently at 21.3 gwei
â€¢ 10.5k ETH net issuance this week
10.5k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $1,529 - $1,646, currently $1,549
ETHUSD : $1,529 - $1,646, currently $1,549
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.058 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.058 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Farcaster (social network) now permissionless on Optimism Warpcast cryptoless signups on iOS
â€¢ Warpcast cryptoless signups on iOS
